T = int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(T):
	S = raw_input()
	numLst = []
	charLst = []
	ansLst = []
	for i in S:
		if (ord(i) > 47 and ord(i) < 58): 	
			numLst.append(i)
		else:
			charLst.append(i)
	numLst.sort(reverse=True)
	charLst.sort(reverse=True)
	for i in xrange(S.__len__()):
		if (ord(S[i]) > 47 and ord(S[i]) < 58):
			ansLst.append(numLst.pop())
		else:
			ansLst.append(charLst.pop())
	print "".join(ansLst)
